text: This drinking place is quite large, consisting of the bar, sofas, high chairs and even two VIP rooms. Draft Sapporo (both lager and dark) was $6 for half pint and $11 for full pint, excluding service charge, during Happy Hour (11am-8pm). Very quiet, perfect for chilling on your own or chatting with friends. It doesnâ€™t sell food but I think you can buy them from the supermarket Eccellente.

Wine Mansion a new quiet and huge seating space bar is opened up in a new commercial space beside The Centrepoint Mall. Spoke to the staff and understand they opened it 3 weeks ago. Got a good collection of wines for either to drink or buy for take away. Staff is very friendly and now Monkey Shoulders promotion is going on, where you need a scan a code and get 2 pegs of whiskey for free. Tried another mixed fruit with cranberry juice cocktail and taste was good.
Nice bar concept inside Hao mart. Similar to the Grocer bar inside some of the large NTUC fairprice. Serve a variety of liquors and draft beer as well. Not as cheap as NTUC but still acceptable
The wine and other drinks were very good. I didn't try the food so I'll try it next time.

The chap serving the place is five stars. Makes you feel comfortable and obliges all sorts of questions. The happy hour prices are very decent. Today I paid $4 for a suntory half pint. You can buy food from the shops there and bring it over so you can have a booze filled lunch ðŸ˜† no pics today but the other reviewers have lots
